description: A Red Corvette cocktail is the perfect way to commemorate Chevrolet's superior craftsmanship. This drink is a colorful and refreshing way to pay homage to the automaker's superior craftsmanship. This fruity drink requires very little effort, making it super easy for you!
name: Red Corvette

recipeInstructions.name: Add melon liqueur, hazelnut liqueur, strawberry pulp, and ice to  a blender. Blend until smooth.
recipeInstructions.text: Add melon liqueur, hazelnut liqueur, strawberry pulp, and ice to  a blender. Blend until smooth.

recipeInstructions.name: Use a variable-speed blender to crush the ice more effectively and whip up large matches whenever you have company.
recipeInstructions.text: Use a variable-speed blender to crush the ice more effectively and whip up large matches whenever you have company.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour into a poco grande glass garnished with sugar rim. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.text: Pour into a poco grande glass garnished with sugar rim. Enjoy!
